welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Parlier, where small town charm meets big city excitement! Known for its rich agriculture and friendly community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Visalia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Visalia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lemoore NAS (Reeves Field) Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Lemoore NAS (Reeves Field) Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
